name: Space Bounties
description:
Space Bounties is a game where the player has to track down the mysterious creature and claim its bounty®....

Take to the skies and fly your ship among asteroids and space debris. Your ship's tracker has detected your bounty, with the target locked, fly the linear path and chase him down while shooting enemies and dodging obstacles trying to block your path.

Fast paced third person on rails bullet hell shooter......in space....with robotic sea creatures...…hunt your bounty!
